text: I am having the same issue. Using 'and' and 'or' operators in my if statement seems to be causing the issue. Splitting my statements apart like James did fixed my issue as well. I'll try to build a quick POC now and shoot you a link.
Here is a quick demo page I through together, <https://www.axiomlaw.com/contact-us-4>
The for loop is looping 3 times and I am outputting the index on the page.
If you throw `?hsCacheBuster` at the end of the URL or view the page as a preview, it works just fine.
Thank you for providing this example :+1:
No prob. <@U26B530N6> and I looked at it together for an hour today as well.
It is a bug in the two-phase rendering system that I have added that specifically affects the `loop` variable. I will work on a fix for this today
Sounds good. Thanks for jumping on it.
Please let me know when the fix has been released so I can clean up my ugly code :grinning:

Hi any one can knows how to eliminate duplicate records in a loop

`{% set jobposts = hubdb_table_rows(3691896,"country=India") %}` 
  `<div class="panel" id="collapse1_container">`
  `<div class="accordion-heading" role="tab" id="heading_1">`
    `<h6 class="panel-title">`
      `<a role="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-parent="#accordion" href="#collapse1" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="collapse1">Finance & Legal - G&A</a>`
    `</h6>` 
  `</div>` 
    `{% for job in jobposts|reverse|unique  %}`   
    `{% if job.status == 1 %}`
    `{% if job.role_department.id == 1 %}`    
    `<div id="collapse1" class="panel-collapse collapse" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="heading_1">`
      `<div class="panel-body">`
        `<div class="panel-group" id="accordion">` 
          `<div class="panel">` 
            `<div>`
              `<div class="panel-body">` 
                    `<div class="card p-0 f-cat mb-3 border-0 shadow-sm shadow--on-hover" >`
                    `<div class="card-body p-3">`
                    `<div class="row justify-content-between  align-items-center">`
                      `<div class="col-md-5 color--heading">`
                        `<div class="widget-job-title d-flex align-items-center">`
                          `{#<span class=" badge-circle text-white">{{ row.role_badge }}</span> {{row.hs_created_at}} hs_created_at|datetimeformat('%m.%d.%Y') #}` 
                          `<a href="{{ job.link }}" target="_blank">{{ job.role_name }} </a>`
                          `{#<p class="m-0 p-0"><span class="text-muted time">3  days ago</span></p> #}`
                        `</div>`
                      `</div>`
                      `<div class="col-md-2 my-3 my-sm-0">`
                        `<div class="widget-job-info">`
                        `<p class="type m-0 p-0">{{job.job_type.name}} </p>`
                        `<p class="text-muted m-0 p-0">in <span class="location">{{job.city}}, {{job.country.name}}</span></p>`
                        `</div>`
                      `</div>` 
                      `<div class="col-3 col-md-3 my-3 my-sm-0 text-center">`
                        `<div class="widget-job-category {{job.badge_style.name}}">`
                          `<i class="indicator bg-warning"></i>`
                          `<span>{{ job.role_department.name }}</span>`
                        `</div>`
                      `</div>`
                      `<div class="col-2 col-md-2 my-3 my-sm-0 ">`
                        `<div class="widget-job-btn text-center">`
                           `<a href="{{ job.link }}" class="btn btn-secondary btn-sm" target="_blank">Apply Now</a>`
                        `</div>`
                      `</div>`
                    `</div>`
                  `</div>`
                `</div>` 
              `</div>`
            `</div>`
          `</div>`
        `</div>`
      `</div>`
    `</div>` 
    `{% else %}`
    `<div id="collapse1" class="panel-collapse collapse" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="heading_1">`
      `<div class="panel-body">`
        `<div class="panel-group" id="accordion1">` 
          `<div class="panel">`  
            `<div class="panel-body">` 
              `<div class="card p-0 f-cat mb-3 border-0 shadow-sm shadow--on-hover" >`
                `<div class="card-body p-3">`
                  `<div class="row justify-content-between  align-items-center">`
                    `<div class="col-md-5 color--heading">`
                      `<div class="widget-job-title d-flex align-items-center">`
                        `No Records`
                      `</div>`
                    `</div>` 
                  `</div>`
                `</div>`
              `</div>`  
            `</div>`
          `</div>`
        `</div>`
      `</div>`
    `</div>` 

    `{% endif %}`  
    `{% endif %}`  
    `{% endfor %}`     
    
`</div>`
even if the hubdb table rows have duplicate content, the rows do not have duplicate idâ€™s, so that is why the unique filter is not working
maybe post a simplified snippet of your code?
I have coded the fix up for this, and I'll roll it out tomorrow
